local_intent: Execute transfer to red_plate: approach above target, align precisely, lower until contact, place white_plate at red_plate_center with light press, release, verify gripper empty, and retreat.
assumptions: white_plate is currently held in the gripper
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase following the GLOBAL_BT sequence: continues from MoveAbove(red_plate) to approach, contact-based lowering, PlaceAt with press_force=10, OpenGripper, verify white_plate not in gripper (Inverter(ObjectInGripper)), and retreat, matching GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION steps and success criteria.
